biotools.summary: RDscan is a snakemake pipeline to find deletions and putative regions of difference (RD) in mycobacterium tuberculosis complex (MTBC) genomes, it is also capable to determine already known or user defined RDs.

bioschemas.name: RDscan
bioschemas.summary: RDscan is a snakemake pipeline to find deletions and putative regions of difference (RD) in mycobacterium tuberculosis complex (MTBC) genomes, it is also capable to determine already known or user defined RDs.
